attributes.action: withdraw Employees' National Insurance contribution as a seperate deduction from earnings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would advocate instead the inclusion of the equivalent into Income Tax, no longer differentiating between "earned" and "unearned" income.
This Employers' National Insurance would continue at rates determined by the government of the day.
Abolishing Employees' NI contribution as a seperate deduction would give an incentive to this and future governments to lower the rates of taxation on the lower earners as well as simplyfying collection from self-employed people.
